verses.content: Juda lal Jotham, Ahaz le Hezekia hai inlal laia Moreseth mi Mika kuoma LALPA thu hung tlung, Samaria khuo le Jerusalem chung- châng thu a hmu chu.
Nangni chihai, in rêngin hre unla, aw leihnuoi le a sûnga um po pohai; ngai ro, Lalpa PATHIEN, Lalpa chu a biekin inthienga inthawkin nangni kala in chungthu hretu ni raw se.
Ngai ta u, LALPA chu a hmuna inthawkin a hung suok a, hung ṭum a ta, hnuoi hmun insânghai chu a chîl ding a ni sih a.
Mei bula khuoihlu ang le hmun inṭêna tui inkhaw thla ang elin, tlânghai chu a hnuoia chun intui an ta, vadung ruomhai chu kakintan an tih.
Hieng po po hi Jakobhai baw- sietna le Israel sûngkuohai suolna lei a nih. Jakobhai bawsietna chu ieng am a na? Samaria ni lo am a nih? Juda bâwlhmunhai chu ieng am a na? Jerusalem ni lo am a nih?
Chuleiin, Samaria chu phûla thil se um khâwm angin siem ka ta, grêp huon hmun ang elin; chun, chu hmuna lunghai chu vadung ruom tieng inhlum thlâng ka ta, a lung- phûmhai chu suklang ka tih.

A milim siemfâwmhai po po chu sukkawi hâwp vawng nîng an ta; a nawchizawr manhai chu meia raw hmang nîng a tih, a milimhai po po chu sukbohmang ka tih; nawchizawr mana a lâk khâwm a ni leiin, nawchizawr man bawkin ṭhang an tih.
Hi hi lei hin ṭap ka ta, khêk rak rak ka ta, inhlîp le saruokin um ka ta, sihalhai angin khêk ka ta, varîng- seihai angin inrûm ka tih.
A hliemnahai chu sukdam thei a ni nawh; Juda ram a tlung ta hiel sih a; ka mihai kawtkhâr, Jerusalem meu khawm a tlung a nih.
Gath khuoa chun hril naw unla, ṭap dêr naw ro; Beth-le-Aphra khuoa chun pilvutah inbuol rawh.
Aw Sapphir mi, saruok le inzak- takin fe hmang rawh; Zaanan mi chu a hung suok nawh; Bethezel ṭapna chun ngîr chankhal a ti cheu.
Maroth mi chun chanṭha chang a nghâkhla hlie hlie el a, LALPA kuoma inthawka thil ṭha naw chu Jerusalem kawtkhâr bul chena a hung tlung thlâk leiin.
Aw Lakis mi, tawlailîr chu sakawr hrâta chun bel rawh; ama hi Zion naunu suolna bul a nih, Israel- hai bawsietnahai chu nangmaa hin a um a lo ni sih a.
Chuleiin, Moreseth-gath kuoma chun inthlana thilpêk i pêk ding a nih: Akzik inhai chu Israel lalhai ta dingin hlêmna nîng a tih.
Aw Maresa mi, nangma neitu ding i kuomah la hung ṭhuoi ka tih; Israelhai ropuina chu Adullam chen rauin hung a tih.
Invâw kawl la, i nau dittakhai lei chun invâw kawl rawh; mulukawl ang elin insukkawl nasa rawh, i kuoma inthawka sala ṭhuoiin an um ta sih a.
